name: pulsar-punctual
description: Live coding Punctual from within Pulsar - audio-visual performance language integration

enabled.title: Enable Punctual to OSC/Tidal integration
enabled.description: Enable UDP message receiver for SuperCollider/Tidal dirt messages

debug.title: Verbose OSC Logging
debug.description: Verbose log each incoming message in pulsar-punctual console

phaseSyncEnabled.title: Cycle/Phase Sync
phaseSyncEnabled.description: Align Punctual's cycle phase to Tidal's /dirt/play cycle. Helps keep things in time with each other.

phaseTolerance.title: Maximum Phase Tolerance (in cycles)
phaseTolerance.description: Max allowed phase error (cycles) before re-alignment (default 1/10).
